profile.about: I'm a software engineer with a genuine curiosity for solving complex problems in creative ways. I believe that my diverse background in music, business analytics, and programming enables me to tackle any challenge I face both from an artistic and a pragmatic point of view. As a team member, my primary focus is great output with the added flexibility of being of help to whoever may need it.
profile.focus: Building Complex UIs with plain CSS
profile.name: Panayiotis Dimopoulos

nodes.description: flowNotes is a full stack video / notetaking application built in React / Redux, Express, and PostgreSQL that aims to give gamers a single hub for analyzing esports footage. It is a community-driven site that allows a user to interact with other users' content making it a great tool for self-analysis, collaborative learning, and coaching.
nodes.name: flowNotes

nodes.description: Player Seeking Player is a full-stack application built in React / Redux, Flask, Python, and PostgreSQL that aims to ease the difficulty of networking with local musicians in the COVID-19 era. This project was built completely in Vanilla CSS to cultivate the skill of building a fluid UI from the ground up. It is a social media application which allows users to post recordings, search for other users by instrument and preferred styles, and create bands all in the interest of managing the networking and collaboration of local musicians. It is my hope that it will help hobbyist and professional musicians alike manage their musical endeavors.
nodes.name: Player Seeking Player

nodes.description: A note-taking and organizational web application inspired by evernote.com. Users can take notes, organize them into notebooks, and delete said notes and notebooks at their discretion.
nodes.name: EverQuote

nodes.description: readWell is a fullstack book management application built with Pug.js/CSS/JavaScript, Express, and PostgreSQL that aims to give book fans a platform to track books they have read, discover new books to read, and leave reviews on books they either love or hate. Its user experience is built with simplicity in mind to make it a usable website for people of all different walks of life. The project is inspired by goodreads.com.
nodes.name: aAGoodreads
